name: Railway
description:
How to play

Use the cursor to drag the tool(axe,  pick, railway ) to connect two rails which the game gives at the beginning.

  • The axe for cutting tre
  • a pick for breaking stones
  • a railway for laying rails

Try to gain as much score as possible!

The score will be deducted by the time, the action, and the rail that the player takes. The less a player takes, the less deduct.
